thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 6 of 3720
thread.title: Deborah

author: Deborah
title: Deborah
text:
My books were more reasonable than 2nd & Charles, our local used book store. The condition of each book is accurately represented and I like that they try to bundle books to save on shipping. They have the Science Fiction authors I read.
I have one suggestion: have a list of best reviewed books for each genre such as Hugo winners for science fiction so we can try new authors in our area of interest. This is a fast reliable source for casual reading.
